entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches along parts of the coast early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 15 except 8 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
